prompts: Create a Pokemon that embodies the essence of pollution and has a unique dual-body structure.
I want a whimsical creature with a playful personality that releases colorful gas clouds.
Generate a toxic-themed Pokemon that floats effortlessly in urban environments.
Make a creature that resembles a gas-filled balloon with a quirky and mischievous expression.
Imagine a Pokemon designed to illustrate the concept of environmental hazards with a fun twist.
Design a character that represents both poison and fun, with a round, puffy appearance.
Show me a Pokemon that mixes colors and shapes to create a quirky, whimsical look.

distinctive_features: Multiple yellow gas particles surrounding it
